instance_template: node(1..3). edge(1,2). edge(2,3). start_node(1). target_node(3). horizon(5).
generator: at_node(S,0) :- start_node(S). time(1..H) :- horizon(H). { move(U,V,T) : edge(U,V) } = 1 :- at_node(U,T-1), time(T). at_node(V,T) :- move(U,V,T).

hard_constraints.description: To ensure the robot fulfills its mission, we must verify that every designated target location has been visited at least once. We enforce this by stating that it is a violation if the count of time steps the robot spent at a target location is exactly zero.
